providers.title: Sources
providers.description: You can watch the series using the sources below, just click on any of them.

favorites.removeError: Error occurred while removing from favorites
favorites.addError: Error occurred while adding to favorites

waitPeers.pleaseWait: Please wait while connecting to the room
waitPeers.mayTakeTime: This may take some time, please don't close the window.

language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application

nostr.description: Configure your relay connections for optimal performance and network reach.
nostr.addRelayDescription: Enter a WebSocket URL to add a new Nostr relay to your configuration.
nostr.activeRelaysDescription: Manage your current relay connections. Connected relays are actively syncing data.
nostr.addFirstRelay: Add your first relay above to get started.
nostr.relayRemovedDescription: Relay has been removed from your list
nostr.invalidRelayUrl: Relay URL must start with wss:// or ws://
nostr.helpTextEnd: for more information about configuring relays.

sync.title: Settings Sync
sync.description: Manage your settings synchronization across devices
sync.syncStatusDescription: Current synchronization status across your devices
sync.syncIdLabel: Sync ID (Share this ID to connect other devices)
sync.nostrIdLabel: Nostr ID (Share this ID to connect other devices)
sync.exportDescription: Download your settings as a backup file
sync.exportDetails: Export all your settings to a JSON file for backup or transfer to another device.
sync.syncPreferencesDescription: Choose which settings to synchronize across devices
sync.deviceStatusDescription: Connected devices and their sync status

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your settings have been saved to downloads folder.
toast.nostrNotAvailableDescription: Please enable Nostr sync and ensure connection is active
toast.syncFailedDescription: Failed to sync with Nostr relays
toast.syncCompletedDescription: All settings have been synchronized successfully.
toast.invalidNostrIdDescription: Please enter a valid Nostr ID to enable synchronization.
